body:
Hey Everyone,
Recently on the community channel (which if you haven't checked it out or if you're living under a rock you should totally some check it out here.) I recently uploaded a video talking about the release of the unofficial Avicus Discord and I totally forgot to post about it on the forums. Some of you have seen the video and have already joined. The video I am talking about is this one. Please watch it and join the Discord with the following link here.

I hope to see you all on there! I also forgot to add additional information to the video which I have compiled in a paste bin document which you can find here.

Thanks Again,
shadowolf365

P.S: The community channel now has a custom URL!!! https://www.youtube.com/AvicusCommunity

title: Unoffical Avicus Community Discord

replies.body: Slack is fine. TeamSpeak is inactive and hardly no one goes on and Discord is better and it's a free option.
replies.body_tagged: Slack is fine. TeamSpeak is inactive and hardly no one goes on and Discord is better and it's a free option.

replies.body: TeamSpeak might be inactive at AU times, but NOT at EU/US times. I always see more than 10-20 people when it's 3-10PM in EU time.
replies.body_tagged: TeamSpeak might be inactive at AU times, but NOT at EU/US times. I always see more than 10-20 people when it's 3-10PM in EU time.
